definition: to set/to fix/to determine/to decide/to order

sentences.english: Study on degradation of methyl orange wastewater by high voltage discharge;
sentences.chinese: 用自放电电压的高低来判定电容器的质量。

sentences.english: P16 protein may serve as an important indicator of estimating prognosis of breast cancer.
sentences.chinese: P16可作为临床上判定乳腺癌预后的一个新指标。

sentences.english: Alas, there’s no audio commentary so the offside rule remains a mystery.
sentences.chinese: 唉，因为没有现场语音解说，越位判定仍然是一个谜。

sentences.english: Chapter Two: Ethical evaluation theory and application view on marketing ethics.
sentences.chinese: 第二章营销道德判定理论及应用评价。

sentences.english: If so, custody of the child would be turned over to the state Department of Social Services.
sentences.chinese: 如果判定成立，孩子的监护权将交给州社会服务处。

sentences.english: An instruction can be used for the judgment of failure part in the fault diagnosis system from the characteristic frequency calculation.
sentences.chinese: 特征频率的计算为准确判定失效部位提供了理论依据。

sentences.english: The use of emergent flood dispatching is under the conditions of the water level in Shashi Hydrological Station.
sentences.chinese: 启用非常调度方式是以沙市水位作为控制判定条件的。

sentences.chinese: 裁判员判定该进球无效。

sentences.chinese: 同时他还判定跑垒员是安全还是出局。

sentences.english: It mainly focuses on analysis and determining method of zero sequence power direction relay.
sentences.chinese: 重点介绍零序功率方向继电器的分析及判定方法。

sentences.english: Plate and hollow sunshine board, 8 mm and 10 mm thickness.
sentences.chinese: 判定板和中空阳光板，8毫米和10毫米厚度。

sentences.english: To judge, with solemn truth, life's ill-apportioned lot?
sentences.chinese: 神圣的真理已判定民生分配失衡？

sentences.english: Treating efficacy of meropenem was evaluated according to instructing principle of new drug clinical research issued by Ministry of Health.
sentences.chinese: 根据卫生部新药临床研究指导原则标准判定疗效。

sentences.english: F-0804 For assessing specimen's change in color after color fastness test.
sentences.chinese: 用以对照判定染色坚牢度试验后，试片变褪色之等级。

definition: to maintain (that sth is true)/to determine (a fact)/determination (of an amount)/of the firm opinion/to believe firmly/to set one's mind on/to identify with
to determine the nature (usually of error or crime)/to determine chemical composition/qualitative/fixed
to conclude/to determine/to come to a judgment
to infer/to consider and come to a judgment/to recommend/to estimate/deduced to be
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
definite/certain/fixed/to fix (on sth)/to determine/to be sure/to ensure/to make certain/to ascertain/to clinch/to recognize/to confirm/OK (on computer dialog box)
